meanings.sent1: Her many failures in school made her feel discouraged.
meanings.sent2: The team's failures in winning games led to disappointment.
meanings.sent3: His failures in baking were so frequent, he joked about opening a burnt bakery.
meanings.sent4: The failures in his career were like roadblocks on the path to success.
meanings.sent5: The failures of the experiment were evident in the scattered test tubes and papers.

meanings.sent1: She considered herself a failure after losing the competition.
meanings.sent2: The broken machine was a failure and needed repair.
meanings.sent3: The cake's collapse turned it into a sweet failure.
meanings.sent4: He felt like a failure when he couldn't fix the leaky faucet.
meanings.sent5: The old car was a constant reminder of his past failures in maintenance.

meanings.sent1: The failure of the plan was evident from the start.
meanings.sent2: His repeated failure to meet deadlines caused frustration.
meanings.sent3: The failure of the magician's trick left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The failure of the bridge's support led to its collapse.
meanings.sent5: The failure of the experiment was a setback in their research.
